title: Announcer system
description: A plugin that allows you to play voice announcements.
longDescription:
A plugin that allows you to play voice announcements.

This plugin was created in order to make announcements more convenient. It's very simple:

1. Put the announcer Actor on the level.

2. Call the PlayMessage function from the Actor.


The database of audio files will be updated at the request of users. Simply put, if you are missing something, just write to us about it.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  1 Actor
  •  800+ words and from 1 to 9999 numbers
  •  Blueprint functions
  • Customizable

Code Modules:

  •  Announcer_system Runtime


Number of C++ Classes: 4

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Oxx7kJ3YXRg1PVkuDj3irFRSOW0bmJb5PMmdWU52aOg/edit?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes:

All words: https://pastebin.com/TTp9xfYS

All audio files were purchased from the service https://apihost.ru and we have every right to their commercial use. We have already paid for everything so you can use them without any problems.
